sample.title: Text steganography with letter marking
带字母标记的文字隐写术
sample.summary: Hide and extract a message in and from another text
隐藏和提取其他文本中的消息
sample.description: This is a text steganography technique where a secret message is hidden by marking the letters of the message in the cover text.
这是一种文本隐写术技术，其中通过在封面文本中标记消息的字母来隐藏秘密消息。
sample.keywords: 隐写术，文字隐写术，标记字母
sample.title: Text Steganographie mit Zeichenmarkierung
sample.summary: Geheime Nachrichten in einem Text verstecken und wieder extrahieren
sample.description: Das ist eine Text-Steganographie-Technik, die eine geheime Nachricht in einem Text versteckt, indem die Buchstaben der geheimen Nachricht im Covertext markiert werden.

replacement.value: He ordered his regular breakfast. Two eggs sunnyside up, hash browns, and two strips of bacon. He continued to look at the menu wondering if this would be the day he added something new. This was also part of the routine. A few seconds of hesitation to see if something else would be added to the order before demuring and saying that would be all. It was the same exact meal that he had ordered every day for the past two years.

Dieser Modus der Textsteganographie markiert die Buchstaben der geheimen Nachricht im Covertext mit einem kleinen Punkt unter oder über dem Buchstaben. Um die gesamte Nachricht korrekt zu verstecken, sollte der Covertext alle Buchstaben und Zeichen der geheimen Nachricht sortiert und verteilt enthalten.
他点了常规早餐。两个鸡蛋向阳面朝上，散成褐色，和两片培根。他继续看菜单，想知道这是否是他添加新内容的日子。这也是例行程序的一部分。几秒钟的犹豫，看看是否有其他东西会添加到订单中，然后再撤消并说这就是全部。这与他过去两年每天订购的一顿饭完全一样。
文本隐写术的这种模式在封面文本中的秘密消息的字母下方或上方标记一个小点。为了正确隐藏整个消息，封面文本应包含已排序和分发的秘密消息的所有字母和字符。

He ordered his regular breakfast. Two eggs sunnyside up, hash browns, and two strips of bacon. He continued to look at the menu wondering if this would be the day he added something new. This was also part of the routine. A few seconds of hesitation to see if something else would be added to the order before demuring and saying that would be all. It was the same exact meal that he had ordered every day for the past two years.

This mode of text steganography marks the letters of the secret message in the cover text with a little dot under or above the letter. In order to hide the whole message correctly, the cover text should contain all the letters of the secret message in the same order distributed within a longer text.
